items.sentence: I\'ve got a newspaper article I want to show you.
Tom didn\'t see Mary talking with John and Alice.
Tom didn\'t seem to understand what had happened.
Tom didn\'t tell Mary he had been married before.
Tom didn\'t want the same thing to happen to him.
Tom didn\'t want to do something he would regret.
Maybe Tom was the one who stole Mary\'s necklace.
I\'d like to get away from Boston for a few days.
Tom is looking for a job in computer programming.
Tom is the only chauffeur that Mary has ever had.
